languages.text: Владайм Токара, оставаясь Наместником Футфола, пережил четырнадцать покушений и отправил на круг не менее двух тысяч смутьянов, прежде чем выстрел убийцы оборвал его жизнь. Впрочем, хоронили почтенного Наместника в большой тайне, и все, кто видел его труп, принадлежали к его ближайшему окружению, что породило самые удивительные слухи.

Vladaym Tocara, as Liege of Footfall, survived fourteen assassination attempts and thwarted no less than two thousand schemers before a shot finally took his life. The esteemed Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy with only his closest entourage being permitted to view his corpse, which spawned some peculiar rumours.
languages.original_text: Владайм Токара, оставаясь Наместником Футфола, пережил четырнадцать покушений и отправил на круг не менее двух тысяч смутьянов, прежде чем выстрел убийцы оборвал его жизнь. Впрочем, хоронили почтенного Наместника в большой тайне, и все, кто видел его труп, принадлежали к его ближайшему окружению, что породило самые удивительные слухи.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara, being a Footfall Liege, survived fourteen assassination attempts and threw for a loop no less than two thousand troublemakers before the assassin's shot took his life. Although, honourable Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy, those who had seen his corpse, were all of his closest entourage, which spawned the most peculiar rumours.

Vladaym Tocara, being a Footfall Liege, survived fourteen assassination attempts and threw for a loop no less than two thousand troublemakers before the assassin's shot took his life. Although, honourable Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy, those who had seen his corpse, were all of his closest entourage, which spawned the most peculiar rumours.

Vladaym Tocara, as Liege of Footfall, survived fourteen assassination attempts and thwarted no less than two thousand schemers before a shot took his life. The honourable Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy, and those who saw his corpse belonged to his closest entourage, which spawned some peculiar rumours.

Vladaym Tocara, as Liege of Footfall, survived fourteen assassination attempts and thwarted no less than two thousand schemers before a shot took his life. The honourable Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy, and those who saw his corpse belonged to his closest entourage, which spawned some peculiar rumours.

Vladaym Tocara, as Liege of Footfall, survived fourteen assassination attempts and thwarted no less than two thousand schemers before a shot finally took his life. The esteemed Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy with only his closest entourage being permitted to view his corpse, which spawned some peculiar rumours.

Vladaym Tocara, as Liege of Footfall, survived fourteen assassination attempts and thwarted no less than two thousand schemers before a shot finally took his life. The esteemed Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy with only his closest entourage being permitted to view his corpse, which spawned some peculiar rumours.

languages.text: 弗拉迪姆·托卡拉，作为落脚港的总督，一生中躲过了十四次暗杀，挫败了不下两千名阴谋家，最后遭到了枪杀。这位可敬总督的葬礼是秘密举行的，能看到遗体的人都是他生前最亲密的随行人员，而这样的葬礼催生出了一部分古怪的谣言。
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara, as Liege of Footfall, survived fourteen assassination attempts and thwarted no less than two thousand schemers before a shot finally took his life. The esteemed Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy with only his closest entourage being permitted to view his corpse, which spawned some peculiar rumours.

traits.locale_text: 弗拉迪姆·托卡拉，作为落脚港的总督，一生中躲过了14次暗杀，挫败了不下2000名阴谋家，最后遭到了枪杀。这位尊贵总督的葬礼是秘密举行的，能看到遗体的人都是他生前最亲密的随从。这样的葬礼催生出了一部分古怪的谣言。

languages.text: Als Lehnsherr von Footfall überlebte Vladaym Tocara vierzehn Attentatsversuche und wendete über zweitausend Intrigen ab, ehe er schließlich erschossen wurde. Das Begräbnis des geschätzten Lehnsherren fand unter größter Geheimhaltung im Kreise seiner engsten Vertrauten statt, was wiederum gewisse Gerüchte nach sich zog.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara, as Liege of Footfall, survived fourteen assassination attempts and thwarted no less than two thousand schemers before a shot finally took his life. The esteemed Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy with only his closest entourage being permitted to view his corpse, which spawned some peculiar rumours.

traits.locale_text: Als Lehnsherr von Footfall überlebte Vladaym Tocara vierzehn Attentatsversuche und wendete über zweitausend Intrigen ab, ehe er erschossen wurde. Das Begräbnis des ehrenwarten Lehnsherren fand unter größter Geheimhaltung statt, und alle, die seine Leiche zu sehen bekamen, gehörten dem Kreis seiner engsten Vertrauten an. Das führte zu einigen äußerst sonderbaren Gerüchten.

languages.text: Vladaym Tocara, en tant que suzerain de Castel, survécut à quatorze tentatives d'assassinat et déjoua les plans de plus de deux mille intrigants avant qu'un tir ne parvienne à lui ôter la vie. Les funérailles de l'estimé dirigeant furent organisées à huis clos et seuls ses proches eurent le droit de voir son cadavre, ce qui donna naissance à de bien étranges rumeurs.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara, as Liege of Footfall, survived fourteen assassination attempts and thwarted no less than two thousand schemers before a shot finally took his life. The esteemed Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy with only his closest entourage being permitted to view his corpse, which spawned some peculiar rumours.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara, en tant que suzerain de Castel, survécut à quatorze tentatives d'assassinat et déjoua les plans de plus de deux mille intrigants avant qu'un tir ne parvienne à lui ôter la vie. Les funérailles de l'estimé dirigeant furent organisées à huis clos et seuls ses proches eurent le droit de voir son cadavre, ce qui donna naissance à de bien étranges rumeurs.

languages.text: Vladaym Tocara, como Señor de Paso, sobrevivió a catorce intentos de asesinatos y desbarató no menos de dos mil intrigas antes de que un disparo acabara con su vida. El funeral del estimado Señor se celebró con gran secreto, y las únicas personas que pudieron ver su cadáver eran parte de su séquito más cercano, lo que dio lugar a unos rumores peculiares.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara, as Liege of Footfall, survived fourteen assassination attempts and thwarted no less than two thousand schemers before a shot finally took his life. The esteemed Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy with only his closest entourage being permitted to view his corpse, which spawned some peculiar rumours.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara, como Señor de Paso, sobrevivió a catorce intentos de asesinatos y desbarató no menos de dos mil intrigas antes de que un disparo acabara con su vida. El funeral del honorable Señor se celebró con gran secreto, y las únicas personas que vieron su cadáver eran parte de su séquito más cercano, lo que dio lugar a unos rumores peculiares.

languages.text: ヴラダイム・トカラは、フットフォールの領主として、14回の暗殺未遂を生き延び、2000人以上の陰謀家を阻止したが、ついには一発の銃弾がその生命を奪った。名誉ある総督の葬儀は極秘裏に執り行われ、彼の亡骸を見たのは近しい側近たちだけだった。それが、奇妙な噂を生むこととなった。
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara, as Liege of Footfall, survived fourteen assassination attempts and thwarted no less than two thousand schemers before a shot finally took his life. The esteemed Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy with only his closest entourage being permitted to view his corpse, which spawned some peculiar rumours.

traits.locale_text: ヴラダイム・トカラは、フットフォールの領主として、14回の暗殺未遂を生き延び、2000人以上の陰謀家を阻止したが、ついには一発の銃弾がその生命を奪った。名誉ある総督の葬儀は極秘裏に執り行われ、彼の亡骸を見たのは近しい側近たちだけだった。それが、奇妙な噂を生むこととなった。

languages.text: Binliman Emîri Vladaym Tocara, on dört suikast teşebbüsünden sağ çıktıktan ve iki binden fazla entrikacıya engel olduktan sonra nihayet vurulup hayatını kaybetti. Saygıdeğer Emîr için özel bir cenaze töreni düzenlendi, ölüsünü yalnızca en yakın çevresinin görmesine izin verildi. Kaldı ki bu da bazı tuhaf söylentilerin yayılmasına sebep oldu.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara, as Liege of Footfall, survived fourteen assassination attempts and thwarted no less than two thousand schemers before a shot finally took his life. The esteemed Liege's funeral was held in great secrecy with only his closest entourage being permitted to view his corpse, which spawned some peculiar rumours.

traits.locale_text: Binliman Emîri Vladaym Tocara on dört suikast teşebbüsünden sağ çıktıktan ve iki binden fazla entrikacıya engel olduktan sonra, sonunda vuruldu ve hayatını kaybetti. Saygıdeğer Emîr için gizli bir cenaze töreni düzenlendi ve ölüsünü yalnızca en yakın çevresinin görmesine izin verildi, ki bu da bazı tuhaf söylentilerin yayılmasına sebep oldu.
